DOC.brief_summary: This observational study explore genetics lacosamide response . The study last 3 year divide three stage ; 1 ) recruitment , 2 ) observational phase , 3 ) genotyping analysis . Patients initiate lacosamide recruit baseline seizure frequency assess retrospectively . Patients monitor 18 month assessment ( via interview possible seizure diary ) seizure frequency treatment related phenotype every 3 month . The recruitment period span month 1-12 , observational period span month 1-30 analysis data conduct month 30-36 ( see Figure 2 ) . Target sample size 610 . Primary objective : To determine clinical relevance genetic variation predict lacosamide responsive non-responsive patient . Secondary objective : To determine clinical relevance genetic variation predicting : - Optimal dose lacosamide - Adverse drug reaction lacosamide
